description: Try our easy to follow Fragrant Thai Green Salmon Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green curry,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Zucchini,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Fragrant Thai Green Salmon Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 kaffir lime leaves (plus 1 kaffir lime leaf, finely sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine coconut milk and whole lime leaves in a large saucepan or wok. Bring to simmer over medium heat. Stir in curry paste and simmer for 2 minutes.
Add zucchini and broccoli. Place salmon on top of vegetables. Cover and simmer for 4 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through and flakes easily.
Meanwhile, place rice noodles in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and stand for 5 minutes or until soft. Drain well.
Stir edamame, sugar and fish sauce into curry. Sprinkle curry with shredded kaffir lime leaf and chilli. Serve with rice noodles and lime halves.
